feed.title: Jotter
feed.subtitle: I write notes about various things I learn about, hoping to organize my thoughts and share them with others.

entry.title: Review of selected work in Semantic Segmentation

link.title: Review of selected work in Semantic Segmentation

entry.content:
Semantic segmentation material: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1912.10230.pdf https://link.springer.com/content/pdf/10.1007/s13735-017-0141-z.pdf https://arxiv.org/abs/1704.06857

overview of techniques

  • FCN
  • ERFNet
  • Fast-SCNN
  • U-Net
  • Dilated
  • Deeplab
  • PSPNet

Instance segmentation

  • Mask R-CNN

Point cloud segmentation https://arxiv.org/abs/1908.08854

  • SqueezeSegV2

Outlook https://arxiv.org/abs/1806.06172

  • Video for refinement
